description:
Nationally acclaimed lawyer Donald J. Nolan is the founder of our Chicago law firm, Nolan Law Group. Experienced and well-respected, our attorneys are devoted to providing our clients in Chicago and its surrounding metropolitan area, Cook County and throughout Illinois with high-quality legal services in the following core practice areas:

•         Aviation law

•         Personal injury law, including premises liability and motor vehicle accidents

Through our experience in handling challenging liability and compensation cases, our firm has built a strong reputation in the legal community for providing quality representation. For more than 30 years, we have offered our clients the personal attention they expect and deserve from their counsel, and we have successfully resolved a multitude of personal injury and wrongful death cases. In fact, our law firm has become internationally known for our knowledge and experience in aviation and traumatic brain injury law.

Our firm's motto is "Pursuing justice on your behalf.” This is a reflection of our belief that the civil justice system will hold negligent individuals accountable and provide compensation to victims of the negligence and wrongful acts of others. At Nolan Law Group, we offer individualized attention to each client and his or her family. If you have suffered an injury or loss at the hands of another, the attorneys at our law firm will work diligently to seek justice for you.
